CUSTOMPOLICY1.TITLE: Our rules:
CUSTOMPOLICY1.CONTENT:
• Social Distancing will be enforced throughout your visit, with all people outside your reservation group.
  • Masks are required unless you are seated.
  • Each reservation group will have a specified timeslot to enjoy. This will allow us to affectively sanitize each dining area between groups.
  • Cancellation Policy: Cancellations must be made a minimum of 96-hours in advance. Cancel your reservation directly through Hostme. If you do not show up for your reservation or you cancel after the 96-hour mark, the cancellation fee will be charged.
  • We will hold your reservation for 15 minutes after your designated arrival time. We recommend arriving 10 minutes prior to your reservation time to check-in.

GUESTPOLICES.TITLE: Any questions?
GUESTPOLICES.CONTENT: We are always happy to hear from you - let us know if you have any questions or suggestions at {{Restaurant.BookingEmail}}.

RESTAURANTPOLICES.TITLE: Any questions?
RESTAURANTPOLICES.CONTENT: We are always happy to hear from you - let us know if you have any questions or suggestions at support@hostmeapp.com.
